title: How to Add A Legend to the Esri Story Map Tour App
teaser: Using the Esri ArcGIS Javascript API, you can customize the Classic Story Map applications.  In this article, I'll walk you through adding a legend to the Map Tour app.

title: Converting Parcels to Address Points With a Python Script
teaser: To get around a software license issue with the Esri Feature to Point tool, I developed a Python script that loops through a polygon feature class, and creates a point feature class using the centroid coordinates.

title: Reflections on Building Web Maps With Esri JS API From a Leaflet.js Fanboy
featured-image-alt: a left or right road sign with mountains in the background.
teaser: I started creating web map apps with Leaflet.js.  Last year, I finally learned the ArcGIS JavaScript API. I wanted to share a few reflections on working with both platforms. I believe both have a place for developers.
